description.english: Use the light accumulator 12 times

description.english: Complete a level with beams of three different colors

description.brazilian: Concluir um nível com raios de três cores diferentes

description.english: Use the help of the firefly three times

description.brazilian: Use um vaga-lume três vezes

description.english: Complete the tutorial

description.brazilian: Passe o raio por oito buracos negros
